name: Early Morning Study Academy
description: Credentialed teachers and counselors meet the unique needs of participants to achieve the goals of: - high school diploma/GED - life skills and job readiness training - assistance with college and financial aid applications - assistance with human needs such as childcare All within a safe and supportive environment. The EMSA takes place Monday through Friday from 8 AM to 2 PM at our Employment, Education & Training Center (EETC).

howToGetIt: For more program information contact: Teandra Johnson (She/Hers/Her)| School Coordinator 415-688-7979, or email: tjohnson@successcenters.org
